title: Small Business
subtitle: Creating global awareness for a local business has never before been so accessible. When local cupcake shops are able to amass 200,000+ fans on Facebook, you can truly feel the power of social media. Harness this opportunity by deploying our fan-gated apps and watch your small biz take flight.
